summary: Provides auxiliary utilities and mixin support for the Open Library List model, including a seed representation for catalog entities, cached property handling, cross‑product generation, value sorting, and subject retrieval, all aimed at facilitating efficient list creation and manipulation.
business_intent: Enable robust and performant generation, caching, and management of user and system lists within Open Library by supplying reusable helper logic and data structures that abstract common list‑related operations.
